newsitem.title: USA: DePuy employees ratify five-year contract.
newsitem.headline: DePuy employees ratify five-year contract.

text.p: DePuy Inc said Tuesday some 320 employees at its principal Warsaw manufacturing facility have ratified a new, five-year labor agreement.
The agreement covers about 320 employees represented by the United Paperworkers International Union, Local No. 7809. Members ratified the contract on June 30, the company said.
DePuy said the new contract includes annual wage increases averaging three percent per year and includes a new managed care medical plan. It extends through June 30, 2002.
DePuy employs about 2,930 people worldwide, including about 900 at its Warsaw facility.
DePuy is designs, manufactures and distribes orthopaedic devices and supplies.
